attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: with the main bg companies reporting big profits in petrol i hearby call for the prime minister to not only cut back on the tax to be paid on the fuel but to enofrce the companies selling it to cut their prices and profit margins down before the cost of living and getting to and from work becomes impossible to cope with.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
